Requirements You have hit the same enemy with two consecutive melee Strikes that each dealt slashing damage.

Taking advantage of the brutal efficiency of hacking away at a target with two slashing attacks, you've mastered the art of punishing a foe caught between your slices. You deal @Damage[1d6[slashing]] damage to the target. This damage increases to @Damage[2d6[slashing]] at 10th level and to @Damage[3d6[slashing]] at 16th level.
